record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2557
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2557 -- (Senate - January 25, 2008)

[Page: S367]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 2557, introduced earlier today by Senator Reid, is at the desk, and I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the first time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2557) to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 until July 1, 2009.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for its second reading, and I object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
